languages.text: "Целы и невредимы {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}благодаря вам{/d}. Нэми уже все уши прожужжала о вашем великолепии и великодушии, вы ее новый кумир. Мия фыркает и говорит, мол, думала, что вы повыше. Старательно делает вид, что не впечатлена знакомством".

"Safe and sound, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}thanks to you{/d}. Nemi has been going on and on about how great and noble you are. You're her new idol. Meanwhile, Mia just snorts and says she thought you'd be taller. She's trying very hard to pretend she's not impressed with the whole acquaintance thing."
languages.original_text: "Целы и невредимы {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}благодаря вам{/d}. Нэми уже все уши прожужжала о вашем великолепии и великодушии, вы ее новый кумир. Мия фыркает и говорит, мол, думала, что вы повыше. Старательно делает вид, что не впечатлена знакомством".

traits.locale_text: "Safe and sound, thanks to you. Nemi has been going on and on about your greatness, you are her new idol. Mia snorts and says she thought you were taller. She is trying hard to pretend she is not impressed with the whole acquaintance thing."

languages.text: "Bestens, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}dank Euch{/d}. Nemi erzählt ständig, wie großartig und nobel Ihr doch seid. Sie bewundert Euch. Mia hingegen sagt nur, sie hätte gedacht, Ihr wärt größer. Sie gibt sich große Mühe, vorzugeben, nicht von Euch beeindruckt zu sein."
languages.original_text: "Safe and sound, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}thanks to you{/d}. Nemi has been going on and on about how great and noble you are. You're her new idol. Meanwhile, Mia just snorts and says she thought you'd be taller. She's trying very hard to pretend she's not impressed with the whole acquaintance thing."

traits.locale_text: "Bestens, dank Euch. Nemi erzählt ständig, wie großartig und nobel Ihr doch seid. Sie bewundert Euch. Mia hingegen sagt nur, sie hätte gedacht, Ihr wärt größer. Sie gibt sich große Mühe, vorzugeben, nicht von Euch beeindruckt zu sein."

"Bestens, dank Euch. Nemi erzählt ständig, wie großartig und nobel Ihr doch seid. Sie bewundert Euch. Mia hingegen sagt nur, sie hätte gedacht, Ihr wärt größer. Sie gibt sich große Mühe, vorzugeben, nicht von Euch beeindruckt zu sein."

languages.text: « Elles vont bien, merci. Nemi n'arrête pas de s'extasier sur {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}votre grandeur et votre noblesse de cœur{/d}. Vous êtes sa nouvelle idole. Quant à Mia, elle se contente de prendre un air blasé et de grogner qu'elle vous imaginait plus {mf|grand|grande}, mais ça ne trompe personne, tant il est évident que vous lui avez fait forte impression. »
languages.original_text: "Safe and sound, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}thanks to you{/d}. Nemi has been going on and on about how great and noble you are. You're her new idol. Meanwhile, Mia just snorts and says she thought you'd be taller. She's trying very hard to pretend she's not impressed with the whole acquaintance thing."

traits.locale_text: « Elles vont bien, merci. Nemi n'arrête pas de s'extasier sur votre grandeur et votre noblesse de cœur. Vous êtes sa nouvelle idole. Quant à Mia, elle se contente de prendre un air blasé et de grogner qu'elle vous imaginait plus {mf|grand|grande}, mais ça ne trompe personne, tant il est évident que vous lui avez fait forte impression. »

« Elles vont bien, merci. Nemi n'arrête pas de s'extasier sur votre grandeur et votre noblesse de cœur. Vous êtes sa nouvelle idole. Quant à Mia, elle se contente de prendre un air blasé et de grogner qu'elle vous imaginait plus {mf|grand|grande}, mais ça ne trompe personne, tant il est évident que vous lui avez fait forte impression. »

languages.text: «Sanas y salvas, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}gracias a usted{/d}. Nemi no para de contar lo ilustre y noble que es usted. Es su nuevo ídolo. Por su parte, Mia se limita a resoplar y dice que se {mf|lo|la} imaginaba más {mf|alto|alta}. Se esfuerza mucho por fingir que no le ha impresionado lo ocurrido».
languages.original_text: "Safe and sound, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}thanks to you{/d}. Nemi has been going on and on about how great and noble you are. You're her new idol. Meanwhile, Mia just snorts and says she thought you'd be taller. She's trying very hard to pretend she's not impressed with the whole acquaintance thing."

traits.locale_text: «Sanas y salvas, gracias a usted. Nemi no para de contar lo ilustre y noble que es usted. Es su nuevo ídolo. Por su parte, Mia se limita a resoplar y dice que se {mf|lo|la} imaginaba más {mf|alto|alta}. Se esfuerza mucho por fingir que no le ha impresionado lo ocurrido».

languages.text: 「あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}おかげで{/d}無事でした。ネミは、あなたがいかに偉大で高貴な人なのかを延々と話し続けています。今やあの子のアイドルですよ。その一方で、ミアはもっと背が高いと思っていたと鼻で笑っています。彼女は全力で、面識があるということに感心していないふりをしようとしているのです」
languages.original_text: "Safe and sound, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}thanks to you{/d}. Nemi has been going on and on about how great and noble you are. You're her new idol. Meanwhile, Mia just snorts and says she thought you'd be taller. She's trying very hard to pretend she's not impressed with the whole acquaintance thing."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのおかげで無事でした。ネミは、あなたがいかに偉大で高貴な人なのかを延々と話し続けています。今やあの子のアイドルですよ。その一方で、ミアはもっと背が高いと思っていたと鼻で笑っています。彼女は全力で、面識があるということに感心していないふりをしようとしているのです」

languages.text: “{d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}多亏了您{/d}，她们两个安然无恙。涅米一直在说您有多伟大、多高尚，您成了她新的偶像。至于米娅嘛，她只是哼了一声，说她以为你会长得更高一些。她一直在非常努力地装样子，假装认识舰长大人不是什么大不了的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Safe and sound, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}thanks to you{/d}. Nemi has been going on and on about how great and noble you are. You're her new idol. Meanwhile, Mia just snorts and says she thought you'd be taller. She's trying very hard to pretend she's not impressed with the whole acquaintance thing."

traits.locale_text: “多亏了您，她们两个安然无恙。涅米一直在说您有多伟大、多高尚，您成了她新的偶像。至于米娅嘛，她只是哼了一声，说她以为你会长得更高一些。她一直在非常努力地装样子，假装认识舰长大人不是什么大不了的事情。”
“多亏了您，她们两个安然无恙。涅米一直在说您有多伟大、多高尚，您成了她新的偶像。至于米娅嘛，她只是哼了一声，说她以为你会长得更高一些。她一直在非常努力地装样子，假装认识舰长大人不是什么大不了的事情。”

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}Sayenizde{/d} gayet iyi durumdalar. Nemi, sürekli ne kadar yüce ve ne kadar soylu olduğunuzdan bahsedip duruyor. Yeni idolüsünüz. Mia ise burun büküyor ve daha uzun boylu olmanızı beklediğini söylüyor. Bütün bu tanışıklık meselesinden etkilenmemiş gibi yapmak için çok uğraşıyor."
languages.original_text: "Safe and sound, {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}thanks to you{/d}. Nemi has been going on and on about how great and noble you are. You're her new idol. Meanwhile, Mia just snorts and says she thought you'd be taller. She's trying very hard to pretend she's not impressed with the whole acquaintance thing."
